charmtextdata.text: Trigger Happy

Your SOUL is exceptionally attuned to the process of channeling.

SOUL is automatically converted to the Vessel Trigger gauge.
Deep Healing

Naturally formed within a crystal over a long period. Strengthens the Trigger inside the bearer.

The healing effect during Vessel Trigger will double.
More Power

I need-

The bearer's Vessel Trigger will last twice as long, but the healing effect doesn't increase.
Slash Scope

To cut apart space and time, the wielder must have impeccable accuracy. Accuracy enough to hit even when it seems as if they missed.

The bearer will no longer lose Concentration upon a missed strike.
Pure Focus

A pure focus allows one to maximise the efficiency of their own body and SOUL, beyond a lesser being's comprehension.

The user gains Concentration from all attacks, but at a lower rate.
Strong Will

Only the strongest minded bugs can take repeated failure, and fight without losing their will. They will find that their Concentration does not shatter so easily.

The bearer's Concentration gauge is only half depleted when they are hit.
Still Void

Although the Vessel may hold new abilities, they are still born of void. As such, it is their birthright to command the void and their Siblings at will.

When the requirements to use a Super Move are not met, the bearer will gain the ability to scream.
Quick Fists

Nail, needle, mace, greatnail, shield, bah! These fools have never struck a bug with their own hands even once. All the power you need is right in your fists!

Beowulf's second charge activates twice as fast.
Safety Net

The Trigger is a part of the wielder, and may autonomously act out in order to protect them from death. In these cases, it will sacrifice strength to keep the wielder alive.

While in Vessel Trigger, any fatal damage will instead reduce the gauge if possible.
Bloodthirsty

Being born of void gives the bug a strong desire to consume. Being a wielder of the Trigger gives the bug a strong desire to fight. For any who happen to be both...

The bearer will gain SOUL every kill, a temporary damage buff every two kills, and an increase in Style and Concentration every three.
Consistency Key

Sometimes going above and beyond isn't needed. Doing an average job of defeating an enemy still gives you a victory.

The bearer's Style ranks are now locked between B and A.
Hiveblood

Golden nugget of the Hive's precious hardened nectar. This sap seems to have an exceptionally strong reaction with the Trigger.

The wielder's wounds will heal over time, and their Vessel Trigger will be permanently active with a weaker damage boost.
Overkill Vow

You shall die!

The bearer can no longer heal during Vessel Trigger, but gains a significant damage boost permanently.
Defender's Crest

Unique charm bestowed by the King of Hallownest to his most loyal knight. Scratched and dirty, but still cared for.

Slightly decreases the cooldown of the shade dash.

Reveals the form of Unn within the bearer.

While focusing SOUL, the bearer will take on a new shape and can move freely to avoid enemies. Unn's healing will replace the use of the Trigger.
